page.title: 19START OF THE DAY AT BODICOTE
page.content: NORMALLY EVERY SCHOOL MORNING I GET UP AT 7AM.FIRST OF ALL I GET DRESSED.I HAVE SOME TOAST AND A DRINK OF ORANGE. MY DADDY HAS GONE TO WORK.MUMMY AND MY TWO YEAR OLD SISTER ARE UP AND HAVE HAD THEIR BREAKFAST.I CLEAN MY TEETH AND GET READY FOR SCHOOL.I KEEP LOOKING AT THE CLOCK AND WHEN IT IS HALF PAST 8 I KISS MY MUM AND SISTER AND GO TO MY FRIENDS HOUSE.I LIKE TO SEE HER CAT.WE GO TO SCHOOL IN THE CAR.WHEN WE ARE AT SCHOOL WE HAVE TO WAIT OUTSIDE.WE GO INTO THE HALL FOR ASSEMBLY.WE COME BACK TO CLASS AND DO SOME WORK.MOSTLY WE DO LANGUAGE OR MATHS.SOMETIMES WHEN THE BELL RINGS FOR FIRST PLAY IT MAKES ME JUMP.MY FRIEND AND I HAVE A SPECIAL HIDING PLACE IN THE BUSHES.WE GO THERE AT PLAY TIME TO PLAY HIDE AND SEEK.
